title: BatBoy313
author: BatBoy313
content: TradeCrypto is your window into the crypto industry daily!Fresh and crispy news from the land of crypto and beyond!We are celebrating our Ping Pong digest anniversary today!Ping Pong Digest #50 is live: https://digest.tradecrypto.com/p/trade-crypto-anniversary-digest-50CONTEST DETAILS & RULES:✅Subscribe to our Digest:https://digest.tradecrypto.com/subscribe✅Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/TradeCryptoMed✅Retweet this post:https://twitter.com/TradeCryptoMed/status/1531971738942246913Take a chance to win 50 USDT!We announce the winner this Friday on our Twitter!GOOD LUCK FOR EVERYONE!

comments.author: BatBoy313
comments.body: Quote from: Vuter Rajjo on June 01, 2022, 02:56:48 PMHow to joinSimple rules:✅Subscribe to our Digest:https://digest.tradecrypto.com/subscribe ✅Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/TradeCryptoMed ✅Retweet this post:https://twitter.com/TradeCryptoMed/status/1531971738942246913

comments.author: annenmary
comments.created_time: June 02, 2022, 08:24:12 AMLast edit: June 03, 2022, 10:08:27 AM by annenmary
comments.body: Looks like they place verified information from reliable sources like Bloomberg, which are international finance news portals, primary sources and witnesses of important crypto events and incidents. Noticed that news of politics their writers translate from German, French and other languages, cause still the capital of crypto is Dubai  - so the reader gets the opinion of foreign experts about the situation in English. In this way, they exclude the possibility of "ducks" and "yellow press" fabrications getting onto the pages of digest. The site has a search bar so you can easily find the information you want. This means you won't have to waste your time scrolling through the news feeds one by one if you are still not subscribed to feed

comments.author: bradleydaniels
comments.created_time: June 02, 2022, 09:04:52 AMLast edit: June 02, 2022, 04:51:04 PM by bradleydaniels
comments.body: If I understand correctly some people are already taking part in this giveaway, I just can't get a subscription to digest...just no email arrives and it's not in my spam folder either! should i try again or what should i do in such cases?

comments.author: EwanNolan
comments.created_time: June 02, 2022, 09:41:09 AMLast edit: June 02, 2022, 04:55:45 PM by EwanNolan
comments.body: I don't know what your problem is but I got an email and I hope I got into the database and now I am participating I'm more concerned about how the winner will be chosen. If I'm not registered to the same email on twitter that I gave when I signed up for digest, can I win???If not, I'll be really disappointed...

comments.author: Olek24
comments.created_time: June 02, 2022, 12:16:23 PMLast edit: June 03, 2022, 12:35:20 PM by Olek24
comments.body: Always wondered this, how can a bitcoin billionaire pull their liquidity out without crashing everything? are they truly billionaires? ya cant buy a home or get groceries in Europe with bitcoin yet  So regarding your digest, you see its not the latest interview from Warren Buffett or Vitalik Buterin Though the seriousness of the information provided by TradeCrypto is beyond doubt: the portal has all the key categories, reflecting the main - general latest crypto news in the world, science (and technology), Blockchain, meme coins and crypto trends. The opinion of their visitors matters too: if you have noticed some controversial information you can always contact the Editor Chief with the form in the Contact Us section (see Feedback) to give your opinion or ask additional questions on the subject cause i`ve had such a case with Luna, sorry guys..

comments.author: Bankless-gypsy
comments.body: Quote from: bradleydaniels on June 02, 2022, 09:04:52 AMIf I understand correctly some people are already taking part in this giveaway, I just can't get a subscription to digest...just no email arrives and it's not in my spam folder either! should i try again or what should i do in such cases?   OMG, dude just enter your ***@yahoo.com to SUBSCRIBE fieldWell, i`m interested in this kind of Crypto Trader Digests, but prefer to subscribe to:redditors https://www.reddit.com/r/CryptoCurrency/comments/t5n0k9/kraken_intelligences_february_2022_crypto_digest/https://www.quora.com threads Crypto Feedly - RSS one lovehttps://blog.bitmex.com/category/crypto-trader-digest/ but they are updated like twice a monthBut why are you better guys?
